trans-unit.source: FSInteraction.BeforeFilter - This accesses the file system before doing any filtering. It is the most accurate option and is recommended for most uses. This is the default behavior of the command-line tool and the API.
trans-unit.target: FSInteraction.BeforeFilter -这将在执行任何过滤之前访问文件系统。这是最准确的选项，建议用于大多数用途。这是命令行工具和API的默认行为。

trans-unit.source: FSInteraction.NEVER - This is the fastest option but also potentially the least accurate. It never touches the file system of the devices. It uses only the information available through the USB descriptors. This is appropriate for use in a highly controlled environment (such as an automated Continuous Integration setup). This has the potential to provide incorrect names and data. It may also lead to devices not being detected at all.
trans-unit.target: FSInteraction.NEVER -这是最快的选择，但也可能是最不准确的选择。它永远不会触及设备的文件系统。它仅使用可通过USB描述符获得的信息。这适用于高度受控的环境（例如自动化的持续集成设置）。这可能会提供不正确的名称和数据。这也可能导致根本无法检测到设备。

trans-unit.source: FSInterfaction.AfterFilter - This accesses the file system but only after application of the filter_function. This can lead to speed increases but at the risk of filtering on inaccurate information.
trans-unit.target: FSInterfaction.AfterFilter -这将访问文件系统，但仅在应用 filter_function 之后。这可能会导致速度提高，但有过滤不正确信息的风险。

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Due to a quirk in the parameter formatting, the command-line can interpret -* as another parameter instead of a value. It is necessary to use the complete --mock="-*" syntax, so the command-line interprets each part of the command correctly.
trans-unit.target: 注意：由于参数格式中的一个怪癖，命令行可以将 -* 解释为另一个参数而不是值。必须使用完整的 --mock="-*" 语法，因此命令行可以正确解释命令的每个部分。

trans-unit.source: Note: If your OS is Windows, please follow the installation instructions for the serial port driver.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果您的操作系统是Windows，请按照串行端口驱动程序的安装说明进行操作。

trans-unit.source: Note:Mbed CLI has a similarly-named command mbed ls; however, the commands are different. Be sure to omit the space when using the Mbed LS command-line tool.
trans-unit.target: 注意：Mbed CLI有一个类似的命令 mbed ls 。但是，命令是不同的。使用Mbed LS命令行工具时，请务必省略空格。

trans-unit.source: Device unique identifier
trans-unit.target: 设备唯一标识符

trans-unit.source: Each device must have a unique identifier. This identifier has two parts: a platform ID and a platform unique string.
trans-unit.target: 每个设备必须具有唯一的标识符。该标识符分为两部分：平台ID和平台唯一字符串。

trans-unit.source: For example, to change the serial_port of the K64F with a target_id of 0240000032044e4500257009997b00386781000097969900, the mbedls.json file contains the following:
trans-unit.target: 例如，要改变 serial_port 的K64F的一个 target_id 的 0240000032044e4500257009997b00386781000097969900 的 mbedls.json 文件包含以下内容：

trans-unit.source: If a new type of debugger is being introduced to Mbed LS with the platform, you will need to add the Vendor ID to the identification map. You will also need to assign the correct "update from the filesystem" logic here. If the debugger is compatible with the files presented by DAPLink, you may reuse that implementation when updating the device information from the filesystem. If it is not, you may need to write your own update logic. If you need guidance on this, please ask for it when you submit an issue or a pull request.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用该平台将新型调试器引入Mbed LS，则需要将供应商ID添加到标识图中。您还需要在此处分配正确的“从文件系统更新”逻辑。如果调试器与DAPLink提供的文件兼容，则在从文件系统更新设备信息时，可以重用该实现。如果不是，则可能需要编写自己的更新逻辑。如果您需要有关此方面的指导，请在提交问题或请求请求时要求它。

trans-unit.source: If a platform meets the Mbed Enabled technical requirements (stated above), it can be added to Mbed LS.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个平台符合Mbed Enabled的技术要求(如上所述),它就可以被添加到Mbed LS中。

trans-unit.source: If set to '+', the mocked platform is enabled. If '-', the mocked platform is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 '+' ，则启用模拟平台。如果为 '-' ，则禁用模拟平台。

trans-unit.target: 如果您的J-Link平台没有遵循这一惯例,请通过以下信息提出问题。

trans-unit.target: 使用以下命令从源头安装Mbed LS。

trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.target: 从PyPI安装 (Python包索引)

trans-unit.target: 从Python源安装

trans-unit.source: Instead of a platform ID, there is a target-unique string (X729475D28G in this case). This should correspond with the unique part of the link present in the Board.html or User Guide.html. This seems to vary among the platforms. In general, try following the links in each file. You want to use the url that links to a product page that references the platform. The J-Link logic in Mbed LS assumes that the url has the target-unique string on the end (after the last / character). In the above example, the expected url structure would be http://www.nordicsemi.com/X729475D28G.
trans-unit.target: 目标唯一字符串（在这种情况下为 X729475D28G ）代替平台ID 。这应该与 Board.html 或 User Guide.html 中存在的链接的唯一部分相对应。各个平台之间似乎有所不同。通常，请尝试遵循每个文件中的链接。您要使用链接到引用该平台的产品页面的URL。 Mbed LS中的J-Link逻辑假定url的末尾（在最后一个 / 字符之后）具有目标唯一字符串。在上面的示例中，预期的url结构为 http://www.nordicsemi.com/X729475D28G 。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to change the returned results for certain platforms depending on the current directory. This is especially useful when developing new platforms.
trans-unit.target: 可以根据当前的目录改变某些平台的返回结果。这在开发新平台时特别有用。

trans-unit.source: It provides the following information for all connected boards in a console (terminal) output:
trans-unit.target: 它提供了控制台(终端)输出中所有连接板的以下信息。

trans-unit.target: J-Link

trans-unit.source: J-Link detection works differently due to the information present on the platform's filesystem. All new entries should be added to the jlink section of the DEFAULT_PLATFORM_DB.
trans-unit.target: 由于平台文件系统上的信息，J-Link检测的工作方式有所不同。所有新条目都应添加到 DEFAULT_PLATFORM_DB 的 jlink 部分。

trans-unit.target: 伐木

trans-unit.source: Mbed Enabled technical requirements overview
trans-unit.target: 启用Mbed的技术要求概述

trans-unit.source: Mbed LS
trans-unit.target: Mbed LS

trans-unit.source: Mbed LS assigns a unique name to each platform when this is set to True. The unique name takes the form of K64F[0], where the number between the brackets is an incrementing value. This name is accessible through the dictionary member platform_unique_name in the returned platform data.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 True 时，Mbed LS为每个平台分配一个唯一的名称。唯一名称采用 K64F[0] 的形式，其中括号之间的数字为递增值。可通过返回的平台数据中的字典成员 platform_unique_name 访问此名称。

trans-unit.source: Mbed LS currently supports the following types of debuggers:
trans-unit.target: Mbed LS目前支持以下类型的调试器。

trans-unit.source: Mbed LS is a Python (2 and 3) module that detects and lists Mbed Enabled devices connected to the host computer. The Mbed OS team publishes Mbed LS on PyPI. It works on all major operating systems (Windows, Linux and Mac OS X).
trans-unit.target: Mbed LS是一个Python (2和3)模块,它可以检测并列出连接到主机的Mbed Enabled设备。Mbed OS团队在PyPI上发布了Mbed LS。它适用于所有主流的操作系统(Windows,Linux 和 Mac OS X)。

trans-unit.source: Mbed LS reads more data from the file system on each device when this is set to True. It can provide useful management data but also takes more time to execute.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为 True 时，Mbed LS从每个设备上的文件系统读取更多数据。它可以提供有用的管理数据，但也需要更多时间来执行。

trans-unit.source: Mbed LS requires you to mount a platform before it shows up in the results. Many Linux systems do not automatically mount USB devices. We recommend you use an automounter to manage this for you.
trans-unit.target: Mbed LS需要你先挂载一个平台,然后才会显示在结果中。许多Linux系统不会自动挂载USB设备。我们建议你使用自动挂载器来为你管理这个问题。

trans-unit.source: Mbed LS uses the Python logging module for all of its logging needs. Mbed LS uses the logger "mbedls" as its root, and all other loggers start with "mbedls.". Configuring the Python root logger automatically redirects all of the Mbed LS logs to the configured endpoint. When using the Python API, configure logging, such as by calling logging.basicConfig().
trans-unit.target: Mbed LS使用Python logging 模块来满足其所有日志记录需求。Mbed LS使用记录器 "mbedls" 作为其根，所有其他记录器 "mbedls." 。配置Python根记录器会自动将所有Mbed LS日志重定向到配置的端点。使用Python API时，请配置日志记录，例如通过调用 logging.basicConfig() 。

trans-unit.source: Mbed OS platform name.
trans-unit.target: Mbed操作系统平台名称。

trans-unit.target: 嘲讽(重名)平台

trans-unit.source: Mount point (MSD or disk).
trans-unit.target: 安装点(MSD或磁盘)。

trans-unit.source: Note how both platforms share the same platform ID (0240) but have a unique ending string.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，两个平台如何共享相同的平台ID（ 0240 ）但具有唯一的结尾字符串。

trans-unit.source: Note how the serial_port value changed from COM18 to COM99. Deleting the mbedls.json or using the --skip-retarget parameter removes these changes.
trans-unit.target: 请注意 serial_port 值如何从 COM18 更改为 COM99 。删除 mbedls.json 或使用 --skip-retarget 参数将删除这些更改。

trans-unit.target: 操作系统特有的行为

trans-unit.target: 覆盖所有具有以 mid 开头的 target_id 的 platform_name 的platform_name 。

trans-unit.target: 添加新平台时,请按平台ID进行排序。

trans-unit.target: 简单(无表格格式)

trans-unit.source: Testing
trans-unit.target: 测试

trans-unit.source: The --mock parameter accepts a platform ID and a platform name, separated by the : character. The platform ID is the first 4 characters of the target_id. The platform name is the name you are temporarily assigning to this platform.
trans-unit.target: 所述 --mock 参数接受平台ID和平台名，由被分离的 : 字符。平台ID是 target_id 的前4个字符。平台名称是您临时分配给该平台的名称。

trans-unit.source: The /test directory contains all tests. You can run the tests with the following command:
trans-unit.target: 该 /test 目录包含了所有的测试。您可以使用以下命令运行测试：

trans-unit.source: The coverage Python package measures code coverage. You can install it with following command:
trans-unit.target: 该 coverage Python包措施代码覆盖。您可以使用以下命令进行安装：

trans-unit.source: The platform ID contains four ASCII characters containing only hexadecimal values (A-F and 0-9). This platform ID is the same for all platforms of the same type. For example, all K64F platforms have a platform ID of 0240. mbedls uses this to identify the platform.
trans-unit.target: 所述平台ID包含仅含有十六进制值（AF和0-9）4个ASCII字符。对于相同类型的所有平台，此平台ID均相同。例如，所有 K64F 平台的平台ID为 0240 。 mbedls 使用它来识别平台。

trans-unit.source: The platform unique string can be any length of characters (a-z, A-Z and 0-9) that you can use to uniquely identify platforms of the same type on the same machine. For example, two FRDM-K64F platforms attached to the same machine could have the following attributes:
trans-unit.target: 该平台唯一的字符串可以是任何字符长度（包括AZ，az和0-9），你可以用它来唯一地标识在同一台机器上同一类型的平台。例如，连接到同一台计算机的两个FRDM-K64F平台可能具有以下属性：

trans-unit.source: The Mbed LS command-line accepts a few arguments to change the format of the results. The default format is a table. You may pass --simple to simplify this table format, and --json to print the table as a json list of the rows.
trans-unit.target: Mbed LS命令行接受一些参数来更改结果的格式。默认格式是表格。您可以通过 --simple 简化此表的格式，并 --json 打印表作为行的JSON列表。

trans-unit.source: The Mbed serial port works by default on Mac and Linux, but Windows needs a driver. Check here for more details.
trans-unit.target: Mbed串行端口在Mac和Linux上默认工作，但Windows需要驱动程序。请点击这里了解更多详情。

trans-unit.source: The Python API is available through the mbed_lstools module.
trans-unit.target: 可通过 mbed_lstools 模块使用Python API 。

trans-unit.source: The command-line tool and Python API check the current directory for a file named mbedls.json. When it is present, it overrides the returned values. The format of the mbedls.json file is:
trans-unit.target: 命令行工具和Python API在当前目录中检查名为 mbedls.json 的文件。如果存在，它将覆盖返回的值。 mbedls.json 文件的格式为：

trans-unit.source: The command-line tool is available with the command mbedls.
trans-unit.target: 命令行工具可与命令 mbedls 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The development of Mbed LS has been moved into the mbed-os-tools package. You can continue to use this module for legacy reasons, however all further development should be continued in the new package.
trans-unit.target: Mbed LS的开发已移至mbed-os-tools软件包中。由于遗留原因，您可以继续使用此模块，但是所有进一步的开发都应在新软件包中继续进行。

trans-unit.source: The file names and contents present on the platform's filesystem
trans-unit.target: 平台文件系统上存在的文件名和内容

trans-unit.source: The first four characters of the target_id that you want to mock.
trans-unit.target: 您要模拟的 target_id 的前四个字符。

trans-unit.source: The following is an example jlink platform entry:
trans-unit.target: 以下是示例 jlink 平台条目：

trans-unit.source: The name of the platform
trans-unit.target: 该平台的名称

trans-unit.source: The type of debugger present on the platform affects how it is detected. The USB Vendor ID is used to detect which type of debugger is present on the platform.
trans-unit.target: 平台上存在的调试器类型会影响其检测方式。USB Vendor ID用于检测平台上存在的调试器类型。

trans-unit.source: There are many automounters available, and it is ultimately up to you to determine which is the best one for your use case. However, the usbmount package on Ubuntu makes it easy to start. If you need more control over your automounter, you can build and run an open source project called ldm.
trans-unit.target: 有许多自动安装器可用，最终由您决定哪种安装器最适合您的用例。但是，Ubuntu上的 usbmount 软件包可以轻松启动。如果需要对自动挂载程序进行更多控制，则可以构建和运行一个名为ldm的开源项目。

trans-unit.source: This argument controls the accuracy and speed of this function. There are three choices (in ascending order of accuracy and decreasing order of speed):
trans-unit.target: 这个参数控制这个函数的精度和速度。有三种选择(按精度升序和速度降序)。

trans-unit.source: This function allows you to filter results based on platform data. This can hasten the execution of the list_mbeds function.
trans-unit.target: 使用此功能可以根据平台数据过滤结果。这可以加快 list_mbeds 函数的执行。

trans-unit.source: This results in the following output from the command-line tool:
trans-unit.target: 这将导致命令行工具的以下输出。

trans-unit.source: This returns an instance that provides access to the rest of the API.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个提供访问API其余部分的实例。

trans-unit.source: This tool relies on board interfaces conforming to certain standards, so it can detect platforms properly. The Mbed Enabled program sets these standards. Please see the Technical Requirements for more information.
trans-unit.target: 该工具依赖于符合某些标准的主板接口，因此可以正确检测平台。该Mbed启用程序设置这些标准。请参阅技术要求以获取更多信息。

trans-unit.source: To install Mbed LS from PyPI, run the following command:
trans-unit.target: 要从PyPI安装Mbed LS ，请运行以下命令：

trans-unit.source: To remove a mocked platform, use the --mock parameter again. Continuing from the previous example, use -<platform id> as the value:
trans-unit.target: 要删除 --mock 平台，请再次使用--mock参数。继续上一个示例，使用 -<platform id> 作为值：

trans-unit.source: To run the tests while measuring code coverage, use the following command:
trans-unit.target: 要在测量代码覆盖率的同时运行测试,请使用以下命令。

trans-unit.source: When set to True, this includes unmounted platforms in the results. This enables the same behavior as the -u command-line flag.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 True 时，这将在结果中包括未安装的平台。这将启用与 -u 命令行标志相同的行为。

trans-unit.source: When set to True, this skips the retargetting step, and the results are unmodified. This enables the same behavior as the --skip-retarget command-line flag.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 True 时，这将跳过重新定位步骤，并且结果未修改。这将启用与 --skip-retarget 命令行标志相同的行为。

trans-unit.source: Windows
trans-unit.target: 窗口

trans-unit.source: You can also remove all mocked platforms by supplying * as the target_id:
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过提供 * 作为 target_id 来删除所有模拟平台：

trans-unit.source: You can then generate a report:
trans-unit.target: 然后您可以生成一份报告。

trans-unit.source: mbed-ls is a Python module that detects and lists mbed-enabled devices connected to the host computer
trans-unit.target: mbed-ls是一个Python模块,用于检测并列出连接到主机的mbed-enabled设备。
